section.summary:
Types of Research

Join the Webinar Classroom, Tuesday 9:00 am - 12:15 pm Pacific Time.

In this week's webinar, we will discuss different types of research: Observational, Qualitative & Quantitative. In addition, we will discuss the article by Kaptchuk & Miller 2005. Please read the article before class. Our statistics discussion will continue with the introduction of inferential statistics, including the null hypothesis and the P-value.

During the webinar, you will complete the In Class Exercise #2 "Types of Research". Please have a copy of this document downloaded and ready before the lecture.

Due this week: Summary of clinical trial and systematic review

Due next class:

  • Summary of different types of observational research
  • Read Tunis et al 2003 and Witt 2011 articles
